# Services Images Directory

This directory contains images for the services section of the BuildHub website.

## Required Images

To display the service images properly, please add the following images to this directory:

### 1. Project Planning Service
- **Filename**: `project-planning.jpg`
- **Description**: Image showing project planning, blueprints, construction planning, or project management
- **Recommended size**: 400x300px or similar aspect ratio
- **Content suggestions**: 
  - Construction blueprints and plans
  - Project management tools and charts
  - Construction site planning
  - Team meetings around plans
  - Digital project management interfaces

### 2. Architectural Design Service
- **Filename**: `architectural-design.jpg`
- **Description**: Image showing architectural design, building designs, or architectural work
- **Recommended size**: 400x300px or similar aspect ratio
- **Content suggestions**:
  - Modern architectural designs
  - Building sketches and drawings
  - Architectural models
  - Design software interfaces
  - Completed building projects

### 3. Construction Management Service
- **Filename**: `construction-management.jpg`
- **Description**: Image showing construction management, site supervision, or project execution
- **Recommended size**: 400x300px or similar aspect ratio
- **Content suggestions**:
  - Construction site management
  - Project supervision
  - Quality control processes
  - Construction teams at work
  - Project progress monitoring

### 4. Expert Consultation Service
- **Filename**: `consultation.jpg`
- **Description**: Image showing consultation, meetings, or professional advice
- **Recommended size**: 400x300px or similar aspect ratio
- **Content suggestions**:
  - Professional consultation meetings
  - Expert advice sessions
  - Client meetings
  - Professional discussions
  - Consultation office settings

### 5. Maintenance & Support Service
- **Filename**: `maintenance.jpg`
- **Description**: Image showing maintenance, support, or ongoing services
- **Recommended size**: 400x300px or similar aspect ratio
- **Content suggestions**:
  - Building maintenance work
  - Support team activities
  - Ongoing project support
  - Maintenance tools and equipment
  - Service technicians at work

## Image Guidelines

- **Format**: JPG or PNG
- **Quality**: High resolution, clear and professional
- **Style**: Modern, clean, professional construction/architecture themed
- **Colors**: Should complement the website's color scheme (blues, grays, whites)
- **Content**: Should be relevant to construction and architecture services

## Fallback

If images are not provided, the service boxes will display:
- Beautiful gradient backgrounds with relevant icons
- Professional fallback styling
- No broken image placeholders
- Smooth hover effects

## How to Add Images

1. Save your images with the exact filenames listed above
2. Place them in this directory: `frontend/public/images/services/`
3. The images will automatically appear on the website
4. Refresh the page to see the changes
